version_description:
* Added: Capability to tap nav icon to jump to the top of a section
* Fixed: Bug where flavor and store images were being loaded incorrectly
* Fixed: Store images are no longer improperly scaled
* Fixed: Animation displays properly when flavor images are loading
* Various performance improvements
This version contains performance improvements and bug fixes.  We're working hard to bring you the best app possible!
Fixed a bug with character encoding that was keeping some users from logging in.  Our apologies to those this affected - we are working hard to make the best app experience possible!
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Improved stability.  We are focused on optimizing app performance, especially in low data coverage areas.

Exciting new features in this release:
* Apple Wallet support!
* Reload the cash balance on your card
* Set up and manage auto-reload
* Map view to find stores near you
* Flavor Finder! Find a store near you that has the flavor you are craving
* Register for Real Rewards™ quickly inside the app

Exciting new features in this release:
* Apple Wallet support!
* Reload the cash balance on your card
* Set up and manage auto-reload
* Map view to find stores near you
* Flavor Finder! Find a store near you that has the flavor you are craving
* Register for Real Rewards™ quickly inside the app
* Additional stability improvements

This update contains a fix for some users who were experiencing a crash when trying to access their profile.

These new features were introduced in the 5.1 release:
* Apple Wallet support!
* Reload the cash balance on your card
* Set up and manage auto-reload
* Map view to find stores near you
* Flavor Finder! Find a store near you that has the flavor you are craving
* Register for Real Rewards™ quickly inside the app
* Additional stability improvements
Interface refinements, bug fixes and performance improvements.
Performance Improvements.  We're working hard to make the best app possible!
Updated location finder mapping, performance improvements and bug fixes.  Apple Wallet support has been restored.
Bug fixes for map support in iOS9 and aspect ratio of store thumbnail images.  Performance improvements overall.
This update includes the ability to add new Real Reward and gift cards, remove used cards, and merge cards in your Yogurtland account.

Fixed an issue where a store location would incorrectly appear as “open” on the map view in certain circumstances.
Additional support for iOS11.
Minor bug fixes.
Improved performance and bug fixes.  We are working hard to make the best app experience for our guests.
Bug fix: return properly to store results when launching flavor search from a nested flavor card.
Support for iPhone X and miscellaneous bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
Includes added functionality for promotions, and additional store and flavor information.
Added functionality to change your “favorite store” by managing your Real Rewards account.
Minor Text Changes
Added step to Real Rewards registration process to choose a favorite store.
Resolved an issue the prevented complete Real Rewards registration with a card.
Fixed a bug related to adding cards to the Apple Wallet
Updated Real Rewards program language to match change in structure. Included “offerings” icons on locations screens for catering, drinkables and more.
Minor update - performance improvements, stability, and security features.
Fixed a bug where some users would see error messages when trying to view their Real Rewards account information
Added delivery service offerings to store details.
Fixed an issue with the initial placement of Featured Tiles.
